name: exultancy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a feeling of great happiness: It was a real rollercoaster of a day, with my mood going from dejection to exultancy and back again. I am always impressed by the joy and sheer exultancy of a gospel choir.
More examplesFewer examplesHe felt a surge of exultancy to discover that he had been right all along.I was blown away by the exultancy of the final passages of this orchestral work.We were carried along by the exultancy of the crowd.
